name: Carib Brewery Limited
description:
In 1950, our locally owned “true Caribbean” brewery created its first beer, Carib Lager. It soon became the preferred brew of Trinidad and Tobago, the home of steelpan, calypso and Carnival.

Today, people throughout the Caribbean and around the world enjoy drinking what we drink. And they’re importing our refreshing island spirit to enhance their way of life.

name: Eagle Rock Brewery
description:
As the first brewery with operations based in Los Angeles in over 60 years, we're dedicated to the production of unique artisanal beers using the best ingredients to promote the ongoing development of the beer community in Los Angeles.

Our microbrewery is attached to our public tap-room, where fellow beer lovers can gather to relax, refresh, and enjoy our unique beers. As we do not serve food, we encourage patrons to bring your own food or make a visit to the local food trucks/vendors that we have outside. Guests visiting our taproom need to be *21 and over to enter - no exceptions.

name: Traveler Beer Company
description:
At Traveler Beer Company we expand what craft beers can be by adding new flavors and discovering old traditions. We discovered the shandy tradition in Europe and are thrilled to bring this unique style of beer home, to you. Shandys exemplify everything we look for in a craft beer—they are different from the mainstream, fun, inviting, and social, and thanks to the finest ingredients, shandys taste amazing.

Curious?
